inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: chronic myalgia (>6 months) with/without accompanying arthralgia per DC/TMD

inclusion.criterion: pain present 15 days in last month
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: pain has been present for the past week

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: average intensity of at least 4 out 10 in a verbal numerical rating scale

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: fairly bad or very bad sleep quality according to PSQI questionnaire

exclusion.criterion: dental or orofacial pain disorder not meeting definition
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of pharmacological treatment for TMD or sleep during study duration
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: will be asked to discontinue before starting the study

exclusion.criterion: psychotropic medication or drug known to influence sleep or pain
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain due to a distended appendix, but meets inclusion criteria for TMD and sleep quality. No exclusion criteria met.
